description: Savant created the ultimate soldier to kill every last Imperial so she could reclaim Earth but the plan went awry. As an immortal with no fear of ailment and incredible physical attributes war and anarchy is a wonderful opportunity. However, not having received a proper education means learning and reading will be very difficult.

You have no idea what you are, who you are, or how you got here, all you know is you are hungry and must eat. You look like an undead horror, zombies ignore you, people fear you. You think, therefore you are, therefore you're hungry for flesh.
The result of decades of human experimentation, you are the next step in human evolution through essence.
Your body is improved beyond human biology via relying on Essence. Increased strength, dexterity and speed are all expected.
Your body is improved beyond human biology via relying on Essence. Immunity to electrical and acid attacks, plus resistance to other forms of damage and quicker regeneration of tissue is expected.
Your body is improved beyond human biology via relying on Essence. Increased Intelligence, Perception and learning is expected.
Your body is improved beyond human biology via relying on Essence. Psionic abilities that heavily improve your ability to communicate with others is expected.
Your body is improved beyond human biology via relying on Essence. Increased mana regeneration and storage is expected.

The first level of strength augmentation attempts to maintain your existing muscle mass during periods of inactivity, it won't build you up but bodybuilders could take a few days off every week without losing mass. You will also deal with heavy weights without straining yourself as much.

The second level of strength augmentation regulates the buildup and repair of muscle tissue mid-workout to better streamline the process. Your body will have an easy time building muscle to human limits and you will carry more weight with less strain.

The third level of strength augmentation actively builds muscle tissue on it's own alongside the functions of the preceding upgrades, ensuring you become the muscle hulk you dream of. Since your muscle is growing independently of your body, you will go beyond human limits.
The first level of stamina augmentation regulates blood oxygen content in your body and waste product removal, ensuring you recover from activity fast.
The second level of stamina augmentation improves the abilities of your lungs and heart, your body will perform better under heavy exercise.

The third level of stamina augmentation actively supplies your body with its needed nutrients and oxygen to effectively replace as many blood cells as possible. Your circulatory system was doomed to be inferior from the start.
The first level of Perception augmentation corrects any vision impairment and maintains your eyes for optimal vision.
The second level of Perception augmentation delicately upgrades your vision and optic nerves beyond human limits.
The third level of Perception augmentation allows you to see in the near-abscene of light, and your vision becomes telescopic, you will see distant terrain from further away.

Thanks to that upgrade your skin turned a dark grayish color and metallic shine not unlike imperial steel or ballistic weave, your eyes are now red from increased nanite infused blood to protect them. It no longer conducts electricity, has less thermal conductivity and won't be damaged by acid. Your eyes don't see as well now, and most people think you're ugly and won't trust a metal demon.
